wikipedia_page.main: Darren Anthony Altree (born 30 September 1974) is an English first-class cricketer who played for Warwickshire, mainly as a left-arm fast bowler. Darren now works as the groundskeeper at Thurlaston Meadows Care Home in Thurlaston, Rugby, U.K.
